code: import _objectSpread from"/home/shirin/Desktop/Frontend Assessment- Hacker Rank Clone /my-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";var reducer=function reducer(state,action){switch(action.type){case"SET_LOADING":return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{loading:true});case"GET_NEWS":return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{loading:false,hits:action.payload.hits,nbPages:action.payload.nbPages});case"HIDE_NEWS":return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{hits:state.hits.filter(function(curNews){return curNews.objectID!==action.payload;})});case"NEXT_PAGE":var nextPage=state.page+1;if(nextPage>=state.nbPages)nextPage=0;return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{page:nextPage});case"PREV_PAGE":var prevPage=state.page-1;if(prevPage<0)prevPage=0;return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{page:prevPage});case"SEARCH_TEXT":return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{query:action.query});}return state;};export default reducer;
